ArrayIsStoredDirectly.description:
Description

Constructors and methods receiving arrays should clone objects and store the copy.
This prevents future changes from the user from affecting the original array.

Example(s):

Use this rule with the default properties by just referencing it:

Use this rule and customize it:
ArrayIsStoredDirectly.option:
Name	Default Value	Description
allowPrivate	true	If true, allow private methods/constructors to store arrays directly
